title: FIB: BUT Support and Golive
description:
Description
The FIB tool will go live with the following requirements: 
Add locations via Excel/ manually
Edit locations via Excel/ manually
Request KLS ID for German locations
Request FTTH Availability on initial KLS response
Manually request FTTH Availability
Add locations (state not planned/ area planned) to Interested Parties Database
Receive update from Interested Parties Database and request availability
Integration with PANDA: 
reach FIB from PANDA 
Add locations to project in FIB and use them in PANDA quotes
Handover of requested location data to PANDA (FTTH status...)
Add locations automatically from PANDA to FIB that are added to the project otherwise
  Currently not clear and therefore not committed for Golive:
reqest GFTAs per GFAP 
Interface for STandardbauweise (TMF-641)
no automatic regular update of FTTH data
  Todos
Prep Golive with requirements mentioned above
Prep SDSK (with Security and Privacy Champion of the Value Stream) -> Stefan
Workers' Counsil Approval -> Angelo
PSA Approval -> Stefan
Prep Testcases 
Prep Performance Testcases
Performancetests 
Interface Agreements ready
TechPOM --> enhance agreement with event mechanism, adjust mandatory fields for sending data
KLS GAM --> no agreement necessary as published interface
Preorder@Cloud --> no agreement necessary as published interface (TMF645)  
UAT Deployment including
Integration with GAM
Integration with Preorder@Cloud
Integration with TechPOM
all relevant interfaces are integrated via TARDIS
later (after migration test): Integration with PANDA
Migration test on UAT --> see https://wiki.telekom.de/x/Zorerg 
Align Rolloutplan including migration from CPQ 
Align on BUT testphase and testmeetings
  Prerequisites
Testdata to be aligned on basis of KLS and with Preorder@Cloud
Business Users for the BUT 
 
 
    DOR Status Comment
Acceptance criteria are defined.    
The Epics is approved by system architects (done on Epic level). The appoval was done in develpoment circles with subject matter experts    
The Epics is prioritized within the backlog (WSJF Method)    
The Epics are understood by Dev Teams and estimated     
The Epics are documented within JIRA    
Dependencies are identified and there are no external dependencies that can´t be solved within the ART    
Non-functional requirements (NFR) are identified.    
Security and privacy approval required User Stories are labelled as those. Primary in the acording Jira Parameter     
Initial high-level acceptance test cases written and reviewed by PO test cases we aggreed later on    
All the information relevant to development is linked: other stories, relevant designs, confluence sources of information, other specs    
GUI Views have been defined (in form of click-dummy) and discussed with users for implementation    
Process dependency / adaptations has been defined    

Business Scope:
As a business epic owner I want the FIB tool to be rolled out to PROD with the aligned functionality
acceptance_criteria: The FIB tool is deployed in UAT and ready to be tested
A migration test in done in UAT
Interface Agreements are up to date and ready to be signed
Testcases are in place to support the BUT
a rolloutplan is ready to be executed in July including migration from CPQ
